physical_appearance: This is a toran or a doorway hanging. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The toran is decorated with stylized depictions of birds, animals, foliage, and deities. There is a sewn-on inscription on the center-right of the hanging. The shape of the toran is irregular, with a rectangular top and nine dangling panels along the bottom.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) flower (motif) birds (motifs) deities depictions (visual works) swastikas beadwork (visual works)
